oathauth-step1-test: Pakua programu kwa ajili ya uthibitisho pande-mbili. Inaweza kuwa programu ya simu (kama vile kithibitisha cha google) au programu ya Kompyuta.
oathauth-verify-for-user: Thibitisha ikiwa mtumiaji ana uthibitisho wa sababu mbili
right-oathauth-verify-user: Thibitisha ikiwa mtumiaji ana uthibitisho wa sababu mbili umewezeshwa
action-oathauth-verify-user: hakikisha ikiwa mtumiaji ana two-factor authentication umewezeshwa
logentry-oath-verify: {{GENDER:$2|$1$3}}ikiwa $ 3 ingekuwa na uthibitisho wa sababu mbili
